title: [45w#70] [osu!lazer] 2020.515.0 更新日志
author: 45gfg9
txt_content:
osu!lazer 2020.515.0 [ruby=更新日志]Changelog[/ruby]
osu!lazer at GitHub
Release page
别问，问就是乱翻译的

垃圾格式化php代码有人要吗，超过五人我就开源.jpg

Code Quality 代码质量
[√] Use strongly-typed JsonConverter (osu-framework#3532) author: huoyaoyuan
[√] 使用强类型JsonConverter (osu-framework#3532)
[√] Refactor beatmap encoder test to be a bit easier to understand (osu#8993) author: peppy
[√] 重构谱面编码器测试以更好理解 (osu#8993)
[√] Use strongly-typed JsonConverter (osu#8981) author: huoyaoyuan
[√] 使用强类型JsonConverter (osu#8981)
[√] Use CacheAs for caching game-wide components (osu#9002) author: Craftplacer
[√] 使用CacheAs缓存全局组件 (osu#9002)
[+] Add file header in editorconfig (osu-framework#3543) author: huoyaoyuan
[+] editorconfig中添加文件头 (osu-framework#3543)
[√] Remove usage of RequiredTypes (osu-framework#3547) author: peppy
[√] 移除使用RequiredTypes (osu-framework#3547)
[√] Fix mod failure checks executing actual game logic (osu#9007) author: peppy
[√] 修复模组错误检查执行实际游戏逻辑 (osu#9007)
[√] Remove obsolete type (osu-framework#3550) author: smoogipoo
[√] 移除废弃类型 (osu-framework#3550)

Database 数据库
[+] Add the ability to move osu!'s storage to a custom location (osu#8962) author: peppy
[+] 添加移动osu!的存储位置到自定义位置功能 (osu#8962)
[+] Add more safeties to storage migration (osu#9027) author: peppy
[+] 使存储位置迁移更安全 (osu#9027)

Editor 编辑器
[√] Fix hold note selection pieces disappearing on movement (osu#8973) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复hold音符选择移动部分消失 (osu#8973)
[√] Fix crashes when pressing right-click while placing hold notes (osu#9009) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复当放置hold音符时右键崩溃 (osu#9009)

Gameplay 游戏体验
[+] Add ability for a ruleset to disable gameplay overlays from displaying (osu#8945) author: Game4all
[+] 添加使ruleset能取消显示游戏图层功能 (osu#8945)
[√] Fix applied platform/user offsets being incorrect when rate adjust mods are active (osu#9036) author: peppy
[√] 修复rate adjust模组激活时应用平台/用户偏移不正确 (osu#9036)

Gameplay (osu!taiko) 游戏体验 (osu!taiko)
[√] Fix taiko sample mapping for strong hits (osu#8989) author: peppy
[√] 为taiko强打击修复样例谱 (osu#8989)
[√] Reposition taiko playfield closer to top of screen (osu#9005) author: peppy
[√] 重排taiko视角更靠近屏幕上方 (osu#9005)

Input 输入
[√] Continue initialising InputHandlers if one fails (osu-framework#3534) author: swoolcock
[√] 失败时继续初始化InputHandler (osu-framework#3534)
[√] Fix midi keys not being written to the input state (osu-framework#3536) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复midi键未写入到输入状态 (osu-framework#3536)
[√] Fixing MIDI keybinding not working correctly (osu#8986) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复MIDI键盘快捷键未正常工作 (osu#8986)
[√] Fix hard crash on MIDI initialisation failure (osu-framework#3541) author: peppy
[√] 修复MIDI初始化失败时硬崩溃 (osu-framework#3541)

Mods 
[√] Fix hardrock potentially taking a long time to load (osu#8990) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复HR可能需要长时间加载 (osu#8990)

Platform 平台
[√] Fix "open in explorer" occurring twice for windows directories (osu-framework#3535) author: peppy
[√] 修复"open in explorer"对windows文件夹出现两次 (osu-framework#3535)

Reliability 可靠性
[√] Fix loading a ruleset with a new version specification causing a crash (osu#8972) author: peppy
[√] 修复加载新版本号ruleset时崩溃 (osu#8972)
[√] Fix null reference causing hard freeze if game is forcefully closed during disclaimer (osu#8982) author: peppy
[√] 修复当游戏在免责声明时强制退出导致游戏冻结的空引用 (osu#8982)
[√] Fix null reference in difficulty recommender (osu#9001) author: peppy
[√] 修复难度推荐中的空引用 (osu#9001)

Settings 设置
[+] Add basic custom data directory support (osu#8935) author: peppy
[+] 添加基础自定义数据文件夹支持 (osu#8935)
[+] Add ability to change data folder path (osu#9020) author: peppy
[+] 添加更改数据文件夹路径功能 (osu#9020)

Skinning 皮肤
[√] Fix version-dependent skin elements looking incorrect when beatmap skins are enabled (osu#9000) author: peppy
[√] 修复当谱面皮肤启用时版本依赖皮肤元素看起来不正确 (osu#9000)

Skinning (osu!catch) 皮肤 (osu!catch)
[+] Add support for custom hyper-dash catcher colouring (osu#8448) author: iiSaLMaN
[+] 添加自定义冲刺catch颜色支持 (osu#8448)
[+] Add test for osu!catch skin configuration colour decoding (osu#8622) author: iiSaLMaN
[+] 添加osu!catch皮肤配置颜色解码测试 (osu#8622)

Skinning (osu!taiko) 皮肤 (osu!taiko)
[+] Add taiko scroller (osu#8920) author: peppy
[+] 添加taiko滚动条 (osu#8920)
[+] Add taiko mascot display for legacy skins (osu#8857) author: Craftplacer
[+] 为旧皮肤添加taiko吉祥物显示 (osu#8857)
[√] Fix taiko scroller not correctly adhering to gameplay time movement (osu#9003) author: peppy
[√] 修复taiko滚动条不正确附着在游戏时运动 (osu#9003)

Testing 测试
[√] Don't timeout on long beatmap load when debugging (osu#8988) author: peppy
[√] debug时加载长谱面时不超时 (osu#8988)
[√] Disable dynamic recompilation on Android (osu-framework#3546) author: bdach
[√] 禁用Android平台动态重编译 (osu-framework#3546)
[√] Restore RequiredTypes as an obsolete property (osu-framework#3549) author: smoogipoo
[√] 回复RequiredTypes作为废弃属性 (osu-framework#3549)
[√] Fix libbass_fx load errors during tests on linux (osu-framework#3548) author: smoogipoo
[√] 修复libbass_fx测试在linux上加载错误 (osu-framework#3548)

Tooling 工具
[√] Allow ExcludeFromDynamicCompile on enums (osu-framework#3531) author: smoogipoo
[√] 允许枚举上的ExcludeFromDynamicCompile (osu-framework#3531)

Tournament 锦标赛
[√] Use unique video in map pool scene of tournament client (osu#9024) author: MiraiSubject
[√] 在锦标赛客户端的谱面池场景中使用不同视频 (osu#9024)

UI 界面
[√] Check local availability of beatmap before disabling download buttons (osu#8980) author: LittleEndu
[√] 禁用下载按钮前检查谱面本地可用性 (osu#8980)
[+] Add a basic directory chooser component (osu#9011) author: peppy
[+] 添加基本文件夹选择组件 (osu#9011)
[√] Show more results in beatmap listing when scrolling (osu#8999) author: namaenonaimumei
[√] 谱面列表滚动时显示更多结果 (osu#8999)
[√] Fix mute button falling off the screen when UI scaling is used (osu#9029) author: peppy
[√] 修复UI scaling启用时静音按钮在屏幕外 (osu#9029)

replies.author: 45gfg9
replies.txt_content:
曦灬月 发表于 2020-5-15 21:51
你发错版了吧。。。
怎么，又不是mc更新，我要发到哪里去.jpg

replies.author: 凋灵斯拉
replies.txt_content:
45gfg9 发表于 2020-5-15 21:52
怎么，又不是mc更新，我要发到哪里去.jpg
发去末地（别信我的，我撒谎呢）
